resources.string:
This Application is developed by Muhammad Huzaifa 
 
If you have any question or advice Please email at huzaifaahmed37@gmail.com 
 Permissions Required:
 
 • Access Wifi State for Ping Operations 
 • Access Storage for Download Operations 
 • Internet for Ping operations 
 
 If you are experiencing crashes while using webpages then update Android Webview from play store 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.webview&hl=en
